sentence: In April, Ron DeSantis, the GOP governor of Florida, signed a bill banning most abortions in the state after 15 weeks of pregnancydown from 24 weeks previously, according to NBC News.
author: Ed Browne
title: Roe v. Wade Overturn Could Force Male Birth Control Pill Development
